name: The 2020 Trail
description:
2020 will go down in history as one of the most disastrous years ever. Everyone alive felt the effects of the events — whether it was discrimination, politics, Mother Nature or the pandemic. To keep our heads up at Games with Geebs, we felt there was no better way to get through the chaotic times than to laugh at them. That's where The 2020 Trail comes in.

“[Humor] offers a way of being sane in an insane place.” — Thomas Kuhlman

Take a trip down memory lane in this Oregon Trail parody game where you traverse through the calendar year of 2020. Your decisions directly affect your mood and can make you more susceptible to catching the ‘rona. Don’t forget to stock up on toilet paper!

Time travel in style!


Avoid catching the 'rona!


Revisit the good, the bad, and the straight-up ridiculous events of 2020


Cook, dance, or skate to boost your mood and fend off depression


Hang out with your friends...or don't!


Plow through pesky shoppers with carts


Be THAT guy that stocks up on TP
